text: Charleston is the capital city of West Virginia, a state of the United States of America. It is where the Elk and Kanawha Rivers join in Kanawha County. As of the 2020 census, Charleston has 48,864 people living in it, which makes it the largest city in the state. It is the county seat of Kanawha County. ==References== == Other websites == * City of Charleston official website Chat: Category:State capitals in the United States Category:County seats in West Virginia Category:Cities in West Virginia Category:1788 establishments in the United States Category:1780s establishments in Virginia
title: Charleston, West Virginia
